Entries.Introduction: Thanks for helping fix me up with a house, sugar!$1
Entries.spring_1: Spring is a great season for crops, ain't it?$1
Entries.spring_2: Don't let my small size fool ya.$0#$b#I've got the strength of an ox!$1
Entries.spring_3: All of the axolotls here are so unique and interesting.$0#$b#I love that.$1
Entries.spring_4: My real name is Bonnie, actually.$0#$b#But my pa always called me Bonbon!$1
Entries.spring_5: It's nice to have a friend who is also a farmer.$1
Entries.spring_6: Do you need something, hun?$0#$b#You know I'll get it for ya in a heartbeat.$0
Entries.spring_7: I can't go anywhere without my lucky hat!$0
Entries.spring_9: Olina is such a sweetheart.$0#$b#I hope she has a mighty fine birthday!$1
Entries.spring_10: I love my cows more than anything else.$1
Entries.spring_11: Would it be weird for me to ride a horse?$3
Entries.spring_13: I can yodel up a storm!$1#$b#Wanna hear?$0
Entries.spring_14: My pa is the wisest man I know.$0#$b#I still remember all of the advice he's given me over the years.$0
Entries.spring_16: Olina and I like to get together and exchange baking recipes.$0#$b#The recipes she comes up with are always amazin'!$1
Entries.spring_17: Don't let nobody bring ya down, sugar!$0
Entries.spring_18: That Lala is wilder than a hog on steroids, I tell ya.$3
Entries.spring_19: Growin' up on the farm can really build good character.$0
Entries.spring_20: If ya ever need back up for anything, just know that you can call on me.$0
Entries.spring_21: I don't exactly know what the Birth of Flowers is, but it sounds purdy enough!$1
Entries.spring_22: I gotta get me some axolotl-sized cowgirl boots.$3
Entries.spring_23: Don't let my small size fool ya.$0#$b#I've got the strength of an ox!$1
Entries.spring_24: Want me to make ya some cookies, hun?$0#$b#Or how about a nice, tasty pie?$0
Entries.spring_25: I'm thinkin' of getting more animals for the farm.$3#$b#What do you think, chickens or sheep?$3
Entries.spring_26: My cows produce the sweetest milk around.$0#$b#Perfect for making bonbons!$1
Entries.spring_27: That poor Noa is always asleep, bless his heart.$3
Entries.spring_28: It ain't easy being a farmer, but it's honest work!$0
Entries.summer_1: Summertime is when my pa would make his delicious pecan pies.$1
Entries.summer_2: I'd like to think I make the best bonbons around!$0#$b#But now that I think further about it, I'm pretty sure nobody else makes bonbons here.$3
